title: Pillow Cover, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: cutwork and embroidery with bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William Bayard Cutting in memory of Mary E. Parsons
description: Pillow cover with upper and lower sections ornamented with embroidery and cutwork borders. Upper section with a band in lozenge design. Joined by bobbin in three designs. Pillow covered in purple silk.

participants.person_name: Sybil Carter Indian Mission and Lace Industry Association

tombstone.epitaph:
